tika-s0102t5:9_5: It seems Shady Orchid Tree had fully blossomed, and all over his boiled goods. It turns upside down, and the water for drinking and the water for washing, all good qualities that have flames,
tika-s0102t5:9_6: with the big crows of the tigers, made from blossoming,
tika-s0102t5:9_7: And who was born, sleeping, and branching.
